name: Shrek's Day Out
description:
It's the 2D action-adventure platformer you didn't know you needed! Shrek's Day Out is a side scrolling pixel art game with multiple unique levels, and more on the way! Game Info

Play as Shrek as he navigates the dangers of the Swamp in his quest for Onions, before moving to more locations with even more obstacles.

Version Info

The current version is Alpha 1.3.1 (The Festive Update). This is the first publicly available version and there is a big update coming soon!

Controls

Use WASD to move and Space to Jump. Controller may be supported but is untested.

Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just double-click the downloaded executable and it will extract the files you need. Then open up the folder and launch the game!

Disclaimer

This is a fan-made non-profit game. I am in no way affiliated with Shrek. All music are covers created by myself.

This is literally the first game I ever made and it was just meant to be a bit of fun, so go easy on me.

Enjoy Playing!
